Module apocalypseRPG
Package org.cmpdl.arpg.debuff

Interface Debuff

All Known Implementing Classes:
Burn, Curse, DPoison, Frostbite, Poison, Silence, Vulnerable, Weakness
public interface Debuff
Lingering (based on stacks) detrimental effects that lowers the Apocalypse Characters' stats. Utilizes the visitor design pattern. Interface used for polymorphism
Author:
cmpdl
